mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_id id, c.post_id pid, c.from_user_id fuid, c.to_comment_id tcid, c.comment_content content, date_format(c.comment_time, '%Y.%m.%d %T') ctime, c.comment_status status, u.user_name uname, u.user_state ustate FROM lc_comment c, fly_user u WHERE c.from_user_id = u.user_id AND c.comment_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO lc_comment (post_id, from_user_id, to_comment_id, comment_content) VALUES (#{pid}, #{fuid}, #{tcid}, #{content})
